data.system_settings: Tested on iPad mini 3 & iPhone 5s, iOS 12.1 for both
data.actual_result: The server settings screen stays open.
data.expected_result: The server settings screen should be closed similarly to what it does on desktop.
data.short_description: When transferring ownership, you still have access to server settings (and can prune/filter users).
data.steps_to_repro: - Own a server - Transfer ownership to someone else (can be an alt for testing purposes) - Observe how the members list stays open - You can click the three dots in top right to prune/filter users - You can also click back and view the server settings, without modifying them.
